Introduction
This topic contains information about the means the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) uses to periodically verify the marital status of surviving spouses in receipt of DIC and the status of dependents for whom Veterans receive additional compensation, including
forms VA uses for verification purposes
content of the cover letter that accompanies
VA Form 21-0538
and
VA Form 21P-0537
benefit of the verification process
, and
action to take when automatic issuance of a
VA Form 21-0538
or
VA Form 21P-0537
fails
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
